trans-unit.source: Provides an extension of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that accounts for the additional property characteristics of a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 提供的延伸模組<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>負責相依性屬性的其他屬性特性。

trans-unit.source: This class is primarily used by designer applications.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別主要是由設計工具的應用程式使用。

trans-unit.source: These applications may need to report the dependency property characteristics through property windows or other tools used for editing property values.
trans-unit.target: 這些應用程式可能需要透過屬性視窗或其他工具，用來編輯屬性值的相依性屬性特性的報表。

trans-unit.source: In order to check a specific property to determine whether it has DependencyPropertyDescriptor available to serve as a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>, call either <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromProperty%28System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor%29?displayProperty=fullName>, or <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢查特定的屬性，以判斷它是否有可用做為 DependencyPropertyDescriptor <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>，呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromProperty%28System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor%29?displayProperty=fullName>，或<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromName%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromName%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.FromProperty%28System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: If either method returns `null`, then the property is not a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果任一個方法會傳回`null`，則屬性不是相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the method returns a valid DependencyPropertyDescriptor , then the property is a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法會傳回有效的 DependencyPropertyDescriptor，屬性是相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Enables other objects to be notified when this property changes.
trans-unit.target: 可讓其他物件，這個屬性變更時收到通知。

trans-unit.source: The component to add the handler for.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的處理常式的元件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為接聽程式的委派。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of attributes for this member.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個成員的屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"></xref> collection of attributes.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.AttributeCollection"> </xref>屬性集合。

trans-unit.source: Returns whether resetting an object changes its value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回是否重設物件變更其值。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The component to test for reset capability.
trans-unit.target: 要測試重設功能的元件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if resetting the component changes its value; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果重設此元件會變更其值。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the category that the member belongs to, as specified in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得之成員所屬的分類名稱中所指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The name of the category to which the member belongs.
trans-unit.target: 成員所屬的類別的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"></xref>, the category name is set to the default category, <xref uid="langword_csharp_Misc" name="Misc" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref href="System.ComponentModel.CategoryAttribute"> </xref>，類別名稱設定為預設分類， <xref uid="langword_csharp_Misc" name="Misc" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the component this property is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性繫結至元件的類型。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the type of component this property is bound to.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Type>表示這個屬性繫結元件型別。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.GetValue*> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*> are invoked, the object specified might be an instance of this type.
trans-unit.target: 當<> *> 或<> *> 會叫用指定的物件可能是此類型的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type converter for this property.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個屬性的型別轉換子。

trans-unit.source: This property may be `null` in cases where the attributed <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter> is not a public class.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能是`null`案例中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>是不公用類別。</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter>使用屬性

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"></xref> that is used to convert the <xref:System.Type> of this property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter"> </xref> ，用來轉換<xref:System.Type>這個屬性。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Returns the dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 傳回相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: This property may be `null` if a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> instance was created for a property that is not a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可能是`null`如果<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>建立執行個體不是相依性屬性的屬性。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property identifier.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the member, as specified in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得的成員，如中所指定的描述<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The description of the member.
trans-unit.target: 之成員的描述。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>, the property value is set to the default, which is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref>，屬性值設為預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a callback that designers use to modify the effective value of a dependency property before the dependency property value is stored in the dependency property engine.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定回呼，設計工具使用的相依性屬性的值儲存在相依性屬性引擎之前，請修改相依性屬性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: A callback that designers use to modify the effective value of a dependency property before the dependency property value is stored in the dependency property engine.
trans-unit.target: 回呼設計工具使用的相依性屬性的值儲存在相依性屬性引擎之前，請修改相依性屬性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether this member should be set only at design time, as specified in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個成員應該只能在設計階段，如中所指定設定是否<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this member should be set only at design time; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the member can be set during run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個成員應該只能在設計階段設定<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果成員可以設定在執行階段。

trans-unit.source: If there is no <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"></xref>, the return value is the default, which is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有任何<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DesignOnlyAttribute"> </xref>，則傳回值是為預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name that can be displayed in a window, such as a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 取得可在視窗中，例如 [屬性] 視窗中顯示的名稱。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The name to display for the property.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> instances for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比較兩個<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>執行個體是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> to compare with the current instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>要與目前的執行個體相比較。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the values are equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果值相等。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> for a provided property name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>提供的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `name` may refer to a dependency property or an attached property, and is the `name` parameter as passed to the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> call that defined the property in question.
trans-unit.target: `name`可能會參考相依性屬性或附加的屬性，而且`name`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>呼叫定義所討論的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>

trans-unit.source: `ownerType` is the type of object that owns the property, again as passed to <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `ownerType`做為一次擁有屬性的物件類型傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A></xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>嗎

trans-unit.source: `targetType` is the type of object you want to set the property for.
trans-unit.target: `targetType`是您想要設定的屬性物件類型。

trans-unit.source: For dependency properties, `ownerType` and `targetType` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性`ownerType`和`targetType`類型相同。

trans-unit.source: For attached properties they usually differ.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常是不同的附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The registered name of a dependency property or an attached property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性或附加的屬性的已註冊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object that owns the property definition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>擁有屬性定義的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object you want to set the property for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>您想要設定屬性 for...in 物件</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> for a provided property name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>提供的屬性名稱。

trans-unit.source: The `name` may refer to a dependency property or an attached property, and is the `name` parameter as passed to the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> call that defined the property in question.
trans-unit.target: `name`可能會參考相依性屬性或附加的屬性，而且`name`參數傳遞至<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>呼叫定義所討論的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A> </xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>

trans-unit.source: `ownerType` is the type of object that owns the property, again as passed to <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `ownerType`做為一次擁有屬性的物件類型傳遞給<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached%2A></xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.Register%2A>嗎

trans-unit.source: `targetType` is the type of object you want to set the property for.
trans-unit.target: `targetType`是您想要設定的屬性物件類型。

trans-unit.source: For dependency properties, `ownerType` and `targetType` are the same type.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性`ownerType`和`targetType`類型相同。

trans-unit.source: For attached properties they usually differ.
trans-unit.target: 它們通常是不同的附加屬性。

trans-unit.source: The registered name of a dependency property or an attached property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性或附加的屬性的已註冊的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object that owns the property definition.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>擁有屬性定義的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the object you want to set the property for.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>您想要設定屬性 for...in 物件</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Specifies to ignore the property type.
trans-unit.target: 指定要忽略的屬性類型。

trans-unit.source: The requested <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要求<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> for a provided <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>如提供<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is the primary method used by designer applications to obtain a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> on basis of checking all properties for a <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是用來取得<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>檢查所有的屬性。<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor></xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>基礎</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>設計工具的應用程式的主要方法

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> to check.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref>檢查。

trans-unit.source: If the property described by property is a dependency property, returns a valid .
trans-unit.target: 如果所描述的屬性 property 是相依性屬性，傳回有效 。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref><xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 反之則傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> for a provided dependency property and target type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>提供之相依性屬性和目標類型。

trans-unit.source: The `dependencyProperty` may refer to a dependency property or an attached property.
trans-unit.target: `dependencyProperty`可能會參考相依性屬性或附加的屬性。

trans-unit.source: `targetType` is the type of object you want to set the property for.
trans-unit.target: `targetType`是您想要設定的屬性物件類型。

trans-unit.source: For dependency properties, that type is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A> for the `dependencyProperty`.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的型別就相當於<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A>如`dependencyProperty`。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.OwnerType%2A>

trans-unit.source: For attached properties the `targetType` is typically some other <xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject> type.
trans-unit.target: 為附加屬性`targetType`通常是其他<xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>型別。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyObject>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The type of the object where the property is set.
trans-unit.target: 物件的屬性設的類型。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref> for the provided dependency property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>提供相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A component to get the properties for.
trans-unit.target: 要取得屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: An array of type <xref:System.Attribute> to use as a filter.
trans-unit.target: 類型的陣列<xref:System.Attribute>要做為篩選條件。</xref:System.Attribute>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"></xref> with the properties that match the specified attributes for the specified component.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection"> </xref>符合指定的元件指定的屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets an editor of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之型別的編輯器。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The base type of editor, which is used to differentiate between multiple editors that a property supports.
trans-unit.target: 編輯器中，用來區分某個屬性支援的多個編輯器的基底類型。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the requested editor type, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an editor cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 要求的編輯器類型的執行個體或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果找不到編輯器。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個雜湊程式碼<xref href="System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> is based both on the identifier for a dependency property and on the type on which it is set.
trans-unit.target: 雜湊碼<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>相依性屬性的識別項與設定所在的型別上為基礎。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: This implementation assures that a <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> does not improperly return the same hash code for properties that are inherited by the many possible derived classes, or for properties that are otherwise re-assigned through the property system.
trans-unit.target: 這個實作可確保<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>不當不會傳回相同的雜湊碼許多可能的衍生類別，會繼承的屬性或屬性，否則透過屬性系統重新指派。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位元帶正負號的整數雜湊碼。

trans-unit.source: Resturns the current value of the property on a component.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前在元件上的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The component instance.
trans-unit.target: 元件的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The requested value.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the property is registered as an attached property and is being used through an attached usage.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出屬性註冊為附加的屬性，並正透過附加使用方式使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is an attached property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性為附加的屬性。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the value of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute"></xref> on the property.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出值<xref href="System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute"></xref>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute"></xref> was specified on the property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.ComponentModel.BrowsableAttribute"></xref>指定的屬性; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this property should be localized, as specified in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否應該當地語系化此屬性，如同在中指定<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the member is marked with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute"></xref> constructor of the value true; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果成員已標記<xref href="System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute"></xref>建構函式的值為 true，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this property is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示這個屬性為唯讀。

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties are registered as read-only using particular method calls, and by convention the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] wrapper properties that are the properties viewed by reflection and the descriptors must also be read-only.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性會註冊為以唯讀狀態使用的特定方法呼叫，並依照慣例[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]反映和描述元所檢視的屬性的包裝函式屬性也必須是唯讀狀態。

trans-unit.source: However, since this is a convention and not a requirement to compile, you might want to double check the dependency property identifier read-only state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，因為這是一項慣例，並不需要進行編譯，您可能想要檢查相依性屬性的識別項 「 唯讀 」 狀態。

trans-unit.source: To do this, get the identifier (<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>) value for this <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor> and then check the value of <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要這樣做，請取得識別項 (<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>) 此值<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor>，然後檢查 <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>值</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor></xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A> is on the identifier itself, not metadata.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>上的識別項本身，不是中繼資料。</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.ReadOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果屬性是唯讀的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the metadata associated with the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 取得與相依性屬性相關聯的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: The value can be `null` if there is no metadata or if the property is not a dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 這個值可以是`null`如果沒有中繼資料或屬性不是相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: Metadata that has matching concepts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)] attributes is re-exposed as attributes in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.Attributes%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 中繼資料具有相符的概念[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-clr-md.md)]屬性是做為屬性中重新公開<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.Attributes%2A>集合。</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.Attributes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property metadata.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets the represented <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示<xref:System.Type>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: This property returns the <xref:System.Type> that the dependency property was registered with.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回<xref:System.Type>已註冊之相依性屬性。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the dependency property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Type>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Enables other objects to be notified when this property changes.
trans-unit.target: 可讓其他物件，這個屬性變更時收到通知。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The component to add the handler for.
trans-unit.target: 要加入的處理常式的元件。

trans-unit.source: The delegate to add as a listener.
trans-unit.target: 要加入做為接聽程式的委派。

trans-unit.source: Resets the value for this property of the component to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 將元件的這個屬性的值重設為預設值。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The component with the property value that is to be reset to the default value.
trans-unit.target: 具有要重設為預設值的屬性值的元件。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the component to a different value.
trans-unit.target: 設定元件的值不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This method relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: The component with the property value that is to be set.
trans-unit.target: 要設定屬性值的元件。

trans-unit.source: The new value.
trans-unit.target: 新的值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the value of this property needs to be persisted by serialization processes.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個屬性的值是否需要保存序列化程序。

trans-unit.source: The component with the property to be examined for persistence.
trans-unit.target: 具有要檢查的持續性屬性的元件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property should be persisted; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果應該保存的屬性。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether value change notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor, such as from the component itself, or whether notifications will only originate from direct calls made to <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>.
trans-unit.target: 指出是否對此屬性的值變更通知可能來自外部的屬性描述元，例如與元件本身，或通知只能從直接呼叫對<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>源自

trans-unit.source: For example, for the `true` case, the component may implement the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> interface, or may have an explicit `propertyName``Changed` event for this property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，對於`true`的情況下，元件可以實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>介面，或可能有明確的`propertyName``Changed`這個屬性的事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property relies on the underlying <xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會依賴基礎<xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if notifications for this property may originate from outside the property descriptor, such as from the component itself.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個屬性的通知可能來自外部的屬性描述項，例如與元件本身。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if notifications will only originate from direct calls made to <xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果通知只會來自<xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DependencyPropertyDescriptor.SetValue*>的直接呼叫

trans-unit.source: Converts the value of this instance to its equivalent string representation.
trans-unit.target: 這個執行個體的值轉換為其相等字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name*> value.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name*>值。</xref:System.ComponentModel.MemberDescriptor.Name*>
